title: Catch Me a Catch
description: This weekend is Durna’s annual matchmaking festival.And the matchmaker’s sick.Annie has no choice but to step into her father’s shoes and save the day. She’s useless at relationships, and the whole village know it. They've known ever since the day she was left at the altar in her wedding dress.How can she help anyone else find love? With everyone watching, she had to try. So she starts with the sexy American sailor who just sauntered in to the pub, asking for her.Jack isn’t looking for love – just some help making vital repairs to his boat before sailing on. But when Annie starts matchmaking, she’s impossible to resist.When she learns the truth, and the weekend is over, will they stay together or will life intervene to keep them apart?You’ll love this sparkling romantic comedy because she’s a chocolatier, he’s a transatlantic sailor and the way they get together is laugh out loud funny.Get it now.
author: Sally Clements
